decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted 16th August 2018 and numbered A040618/S03; A040618/S01; Unnumbered Location Plan; A040618/S02, the plans submitted 25th September 2018 and numbered A040618/SK2 Rev.C and the plans submitted 2nd October 2018 and numbered A040618/DP2 Rev.C; A040618/SK1 Rev.B  therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the side walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 5 - The windows formed in the side elevations shall be obscure glazed, hinged to open inwards and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscured glazing.

Condition : 6 - The extension hereby approved shall be used solely as part of the house known as 23 Alderney Avenue, Hounslow TW5 0QN and shall not be occupied as a separate dwelling nor used for business purposes and the premises shall not be used as a house in multiple occupation, including any use within Class C4 of The Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987 (as amended) or such other legislation as may subsequently supersede it.
description: Erection of a part single part two storey side extension, a first floor rear extension, a single storey rear extension, a rear roof extension with roof windows and front porch to the house (Amended description)
